venn.db
Class StaticDataFilter

java.lang.Object
  venn.db.AbstractDataFilter
      venn.db.StaticDataFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, IDataFilter
public class StaticDataFilter
extends AbstractDataFilter
implements java.io.Serializable

Implementation of a static filter mechanism. Every group has a flag if it is accepted or not.

Author:
muellera
